title: WTT... T202 for same or Obaks
author: KLSDAD

posts.post_title: WTT... T202 for same or Obaks
posts.post_content:
I am collecting complete cards, one of each middle section.  Here are those that I have for trade:
Chance Beats Out a Hit - I have either an Archer/Rowan or a Foxen/Chance to trade but have to keep one.
Donlin Out at First - I have either a Gibson/Phillipe or a Wilson/Leach to trade but have to keep one.
Dooin Gets His Man - I have either a Dooin/Titus or Doolan/Doin to trade but have to keep one.
Ford Putting Over a Spitter - I have a Ford/Vaughn to trade.
Just Before the Battle - I have a Murray/Snodgrass to trade.

Here are the cards I have; I need all others:
Birmingham's Home Run
Carrigan Blocks His Man
Chance Beats Out a Hit
Chase Dives into Third
Chase Gets Ball Too Late
Chase Safe at Third
Close at Third

Dooin Gets His Man

I also NEED the following Obak slogans and would trade for those as well:
Always a Pleasure
Cigarettes of Quality
Delicate Aromatic
For Exacting Smokers
Instantly Popular
Nothing Like Them
Perfect Aroma
Stand the Test
Surpass Imagination
The Story in the Smoking

My collection is generally raw and P,F,G....some better.  Cards for trade are going to be in that range.  Please reply other than thru PM. Please use email thru this system or directly to [url]klsdad@comcast.net[/url].  Thanks! Chuck
